page.title: 09FARMING.
page.content: The gentle relief and fertile clay soils have given rise to mixed agriculture.Grain is the main crop. {Wheat}is the most prized crop,with{ {oats}and{barley}grown where the soil is poorer.Nitrogen is returned to the soil by the growing of{beans}and{peas} as break crops.The heaviest clays are still used as in medieval times,for rough pasture and for grazing sheep. Modern drainage has greatly increased the availability of land suitable for grain crops. Britain's entry to the E.E.C.has altered the economic balance of agriculture and subsidies have made possible the conversion of marginal land to producing land.
